All Windows Dialog Box

Requires: Base Development System

Select Window»All Windows to display this dialog box.

Use this dialog box to manage all open windows. You can show or close a window or save the item that corresponds to the window by clicking the corresponding button on the right side of the dialog box.

This dialog box includes the following components:

  • Window List—Lists all open windows in LabVIEW and indicates the window type and the application instance, filename, and VI path of each corresponding item. You can sort the list by clicking the individual column titles. Window items modified since you last saved them have an asterisk at the end of the corresponding window name in the Title column.
  • Show—Displays the selected window and closes the All Windows dialog box.
  • Close Window(s)—Closes the selected window(s).
  • Save—Saves the item(s) that correspond to the selected window(s).
